speaker: President.
english:
President. − The next item is the joint debate on:
- the Commission statement on the proclamation of consensus on humanitarian aid, and
- the report ( A6-0372/2007 ) by Mr Cornillet, on behalf of the Committee on Development, on the European Union and humanitarian aid [ 2007/2139(INI) ].
original:
President. − The next item is the joint debate on:
- the Commission statement on the proclamation of consensus on humanitarian aid, and
- the report ( A6-0372/2007 ) by Mr Cornillet, on behalf of the Committee on Development, on the European Union and humanitarian aid [ 2007/2139(INI) ].
agenda_item: Proclamation of consensus on humanitarian aid - The European Union and Humanitarian Aid (debate)
